thread.title: Defiant Clinton defends flip-flops, downplays email scandal at Dem debate
thread.title_full: Defiant Clinton defends flip-flops, downplays email scandal at Dem debate - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Defiant Clinton defends flip-flops, downplays email scandal at Dem debate
text: A defiant Hillary Clinton defended her policy flip-flops and downplayed her personal email scandal while sparring sharply with her primary rivals at the first Democratic presidential debate, where the front-runner played the role of nimble-footed goalie to a field taking shots at her long record in public life. ...
